Sentencas: Solid electrolytes are the most important and indispensable part of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) where hydrogen is used as one of the fuels to obtain electricity.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: Bismuth vanadate used as an electrolyte in SOFC when doped with different divalent and trivalent metal ions provides good ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: Higher temperature gamma-phase (600-700 degrees C) of bismuth vanadate which exhibits a higher ionic conductivity can be stabilized at room temperature by various substitutions such as copper, aluminium and titanium and is denoted as BIMEVOX.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: In the present study a new series of Bi(4)V(2-x)Al(x)O(11-delta) (0 <= x <= 0.4) samples were prepared by taking an appropriate amount of constituent oxides.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: The sintered pellets were characterized by a scanning electron microscope (SEM) and an X-ray diffraction (XRD) technique.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: An AC conductivity measurement of all the samples in the temperature range of 200-700 degrees C was done.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: The conductivity measurement data exhibited a higher ionic conductivity for the sample doped with aluminium for the composition x = 0.2 as compared with other doped samples of the same series.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: Since the grain size and its phase distribution influence the conductivity to a great extent, the sintering parameter for the sample x = 0.2 was varied between 750 and 825 degrees C in an interval of 25 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: The details of the conductivity behaviour of these samples along with their microstructural characteristics are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: The Arrhenius plots clearly indicate the various slope changes, which are in agreement with the phase transitions that occur in these samples.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application

Sentencas: The results are discussed in the light of vacancy formation and disorder enhancement in the doped samples.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of bismuth vanadate electrolyte material with aluminium doping for SOFC application
